casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeffery Martaez SIMPKINS 188A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 2, 2019 Kimberly P. Hoppin, Attorney at Law, for Simpkins, Jeffery Martaez Leroy. Daniel O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Alexandra M. Hightower, Assistant Attorney General, T. Lynn Clodfelter, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 2nd of July 2019 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of July 2019."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 26th day of July 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
